name: tools
schema:
CREATE TABLE `tools` (
	`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	`name` text NOT NULL,
	`slug` text NOT NULL,
	`description` text,
	`long_description` text,
	`version` text,
	`tool_type` text,
	`status` text DEFAULT 'active',
	`organization` text,
	`technology` text,
	`website` text,
	`github` text,
	`documentation_url` text,
	`logo` text,
	`screenshot` text,
	`screenshots` text,
	`is_featured` integer DEFAULT false,
	`featured_order` integer,
	`license` text,
	`created_at` integer,
	`updated_at` integer,
	FOREIGN KEY (`tool_type`) REFERENCES `tool_types`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action,
	FOREIGN KEY (`organization`) REFERENCES `organizations`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action,
	FOREIGN KEY (`technology`) REFERENCES `technologies`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action
)
